sparqlproxy-desc: Ims page(s) that allow you to remotely query a local SPARQL endpoint
sparqlproxy-i18n-welcome: Welcome to the localization file of the SPARQLProxy extension.
sparqlproxy-helloworld-intro: Welcome to the "Hello world" special page of the SPARQLProxy extension.
sparqlproxy-query-intro:
Send here your SPARQL query requests.

Example call:
{{canonicalurl:{{FULLPAGENAMEE}}}}?query=SELECT+%3Fs+%3Fp+%3Fo%0D%0AWHERE+{%0D%0A+%3Fs+%3Fp+%3Fo%0D%0A}&output=text&stylesheet=%2Fxml-to-html.xsl

Required URL parameters:
Query: the SPARQL query

Optional URL parameters:
Output: text, json, xml, csv, tsv
Stylesheet: /xml-to-html, /xml-to-html-links, /xml-to-html-plain
sparqlproxy-update-intro: Send here your SPARQL update requests.
